sidebarInfo.description: Passionate about marketing and driven by the thrill of development, I seek and embrace new skills, cultures, and ventures. With a solid foundation in communication and marketing, and armed with a 'do it or learn it' attitude my dedication to entrepreneurship propels my journey. I strive to drive value creation combining new technologies and design thinking.

projects.title: EL PUNTAZO
projects.description: loyalty program transforming everyday snack purchases into exciting rewards and fun challenges. Engaging users with gamified experiences and fostering a vibrant community, El Puntazo turns routine shopping into an adventure of prizes and unforgettable moments.

thoughts.text: i really want the thoughts components to look like tweets
I should try some more iterations and see if it works any better
